page.title: 16EMPLOYMENT,LICKEY/CATSHILL
page.content: {Employment figures In Marlbrook ,Lickey and Catshill there are 1745 men and 887 women unemployed. In our area the job with the most vacancies is clerical work (typing and shorthand).The one with the least vacancies is engineering. We did a small survey to find out what sort of jobs people have got. Here are the results: Total 94,Housewives 22,Manual work 36, Office work 28,Social work 6, Unemployed 2.Here are the three most popular jobs:Office work 8,Engineering 4,Teachers 5. {Shops There are a number of shops in the Catshill area and a few local shops at Lickey. These are handy for housewives between visits to supermarkets in Bromsgrove and B'ham.
